ygData.subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: Can t say that I have ever groupped with anybody that said... ...my god kerouac - thank god your here... please play that see invis song please or ...wow,
ygData.messageBody:
Can't say that I have ever groupped with anybody that said...

"...my god kerouac - thank god your here... please play that see invis song
please"
or
"...wow, never knew bards could sing a so I could see invis - cool"

Don't most casters get see invis WAY before lvl 24? And most humans have
found a way to deal with the night vision by lvl 24, unless there is a
recent death involved... That's what I mean when I say useless...

There is no doubt alot of our songs are specialized, like the psalm series
and such... but, there are about 6 uselss - they are TOO specialized.

MMM, Disenchanting, Identify jump right to mind, am I to toss the lvl 24
song into that same heap now? Can they be used, yes... are they useful - I
have not found them useful.

I just think that if Verant is gonna limit our songs to 50, and then not
really implement 50... that there shouldn't be that many lemons...

Kerouac Dharmabum
lvl 34
Rodcent Nife
----- Original Message -----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2000 7:57 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] What about the lvl 24 song?


> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> >From: "Tim Burke" <tjohnburke@...>
> >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [eqbards] What about the lvl 24 song?
> >Date: Fri, 18 Feb 2000 07:37:58 -0500
> >
> >Now that they fixed the clouding song...
> >
> >Wat was the plan for the lvl 24 see invis song?
> >
> >Does anybody remember the discussion? Is this just another useless song
> >that they are going to expect us to deal with...
> >
> >I swear, when does NWN come out?
> >
> >
>
> If you think the 24th lvl song is useless then you need to rethink your
> position. Otherwise you will find the pet users in your group will be
> mightly PO'd with you when you try to give them see invis. Also the 24th
> lvl song grants Ultravision, which is a big help to our night-blind human
> friends.
>
> FYI Very few, if ANY of our songs are useless. Some are just more
> specialized then others.
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
